definition: France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])
to try by all available methods

sentences.chinese: 我沒法兒相信自己的眼睛。

sentences.english: And know that I had my wounds and also my healing. 3 B.
sentences.chinese: 我的許多創傷，但也有我的醫治的法兒。

sentences.english: Let's try to draw the secret out of him.
sentences.chinese: 讓我們想法兒套他的話。

sentences.english: I don’t see how I can help you.
Different places in China have different ways to celebrate it. We usually have dumplings in northern China.
sentences.chinese: 中國各個地方的過法兒不太一樣，我們北方是喫餃子。

sentences.english: B:But you just can't compare the former two with Alaska.
sentences.chinese: 前兩者可沒法兒和阿拉斯加相比。

sentences.english: He had no way of guessing which road Rabadash would take.
sentences.chinese: 他沒法兒猜測拉巴達什會走哪條路。

sentences.english: Because my mother works alone in this valley, so she can't ask the neighbors for help.
sentences.chinese: 因爲這是母親獨自幹活的峽谷，沒法兒去托賴衆鄉鄰。

sentences.english: And she is always trying to get compliments on the way she dresses.
sentences.chinese: 她總是想法兒讓別人稱讚她的衣服。

sentences.english: What I want is to take my bus to school, but at the moment that’s impossible.
sentences.chinese: 我真想做的事是坐車去學校，不過這會兒沒法兒辦到。

sentences.english: San Francisco was nice, but he couldn't surf there.
sentences.chinese: 洛杉磯雖然挺好，但是他沒法兒去衝浪。

sentences.english: I can't remember everything on it.
sentences.chinese: 我沒法兒記住上面的每樣兒東西。

definition: to know the score (idiom)/to be well aware of the situation
start explaining and it's a long story (idiom); complicated and not easy to express succinctly
to tell the truth/to tell it as it is
trying to hide it makes it more conspicuous (idiom); A cover up only makes matters worse.
to face the wall and ponder about one's misdeeds/to stand in the corner (punishment)/(fig.) to examine one's conscience
to make fun of/to seek diversion
polite phrase/conventional greetings/cliché/to try to worm facts out of sb
